mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (id, username, realname, passwd, roleid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{roleid,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select id, username, realname, roleid from t_sys_user where username != '${@zy.news.web.bean.SysUser@ADMIN_NAME}'

select t.id,t.username,t.realname,t.roleid,r.role,r.descr as roleName from t_sys_user t left join t_sys_role r on t.roleid=r.id where t.username=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.passwd=#{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from t_sys_user t where t.username=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
